name: Space Arcade
description:
Space arcade is a very simple game in which you have to kill enemy spaceships. The goal of the game is to score as many points as possible.
 Anyone who breaks my record of 783 points will be added to the scoreboard.
Control - Arrows and mouse 
1. 783 - Richard93 
2. 136 - ПешкаНэвэльного
